summary: A music group and a journalist cross the region of Basilicata by foot to attend a music festival.
cast: Alessandro Gassmann|Paolo Briguglia|Max Gazz√®|Rocco Papaleo|Giovanna Mezzogiorno|Claudia Potenza|Michela Andreozzi|Antonio Gerardi|Gaetano Amato|Giovanni Andriuoli|Augusto Fornari|Vincenzo Rocco|Giuseppe Santochirico|Michele Vasca
title: Basilicata Coast to Coast
